welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Fishers, a charming city known for its beautiful parks, vibrant arts scene, and friendly community. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer during your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Mount Comfort Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Mount Comfort Airport, primarily used for regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Indianapolis Executive Airport serves all commercial flights and offers a variety of amenities for travelers.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal houses all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A serves as the primary hub for Delta and its partners.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B is primarily used by Southwest and its partners.

terminals.name: Concourse C
terminals.description: Concourse C is primarily used by American Airlines and its partners.

wifi.note: Complimentary WiFi is available throughout the entire airport.
